title: There's Another TV Show That Exposes Children To Naked Adults, But That Isn't Even The Worst Part
description:

\u201c'Being naked is not a bad thing at all.'\n\nNormalising all bodies, a groundbreaking new series, Naked Education starts Tuesday at 8pm. Stream free on All 4. \n\n@AnnaRichardso @dralexgoerge1 @yinkabokinni\u201d
— Channel 4 (@Channel 4) 1680426002
\u201cChannel 4 show naked education sparks fury as adults strip naked in front of children\u2026.\u203c\ufe0f\nJust sick \nand what the hell is that thing in the clip with breasts and a beard\u2026\nPsychopaths \u203c\ufe0f\nLET THE KIDS BE KIDS\u201d
— \ud83c\uddec\ud83c\udde7Paul Hutchinson\ud83c\uddec\ud83c\udde7As One\u261d\ufe0f\ud83c\uddec\ud83c\udde7 (@\ud83c\uddec\ud83c\udde7Paul Hutchinson\ud83c\uddec\ud83c\udde7As One\u261d\ufe0f\ud83c\uddec\ud83c\udde7) 1681281297

The show says it's “on a mission to normalize all body types, champion differences, and break down stereotypes." So to do this, it exposes teenagers to naked adults and allows them to ask the "experts" questions about their bodies. And the show recently featured two people who surgically mutilated themselves to try and become the opposite gender. Of course.

The two stars, Finlay Games and Lucian Main, showed off their double mastectomy scars. After that fun was over, Finlay decided to up the ante a little and reveal their "neo-penis." For those of you trans rookies out there, a "neo-penis" is constructed when a woman who wants to be a man has doctors remove tissue from her forearm or thigh and create a phallic mass of tissue. To attach "down there".

\u201cTrans-identified women paraded naked, with mastectomy scars, full phalloplasty made from arm flesh, on UK show "Naked Education"\n\nhttps://t.co/USaC5AFZA5\u201d
— The Post Millennial (@The Post Millennial) 1682007610

Finlay claimed the neo-penis is fully functional alongside a pump device that resembles a deflated balloon: "I have a saline solution in my abdomen in a little kind of reservoir, and in this testicle, I have a pump, and when I pump, the saline solution goes through and into my penis and gives me an erection and then I have a button there to let it back out again."

Finlay then turned to the audience of youngsters and explained how nerves from their forearm were removed and connected to nerves in their pelvis to try and provide the neo-penis with full sensation. Finlay claimed that, because of this, they can achieve orgasm.

What the show left out, however, was that Finlay actually had to undergo six surgeries due to severe complications and has long battled depression. These inconvenient facts were pointed out by science documentary producer Malcolm Clark over on Twitter.

\u201c7./ What hypocrisy for Channel 4 to make a fuss about being honest about our bodies and then present such a one-sided and therefore dishonest portrayal of Finn's story. They claim honesty about our bodies will help young people. So won't this sort of dishonesty harm them?\u201d

I don't think I have to explain to you how incredibly disturbing this all is, and right on the heels of the United Nations trying to legalize pedophilia. Thankfully, attempts to "normalize" all of this still seem to be falling flat.

title: WATCH: Grandson Of Kansas City Shooter Says He's Racist Because He's An 'American Christian Male'
description:
Last week, 84-year-old Andrew Lester shot a 16-year-old black male named Ralph Yarl in Kansas City. The police said Yarl was picking up his siblings and mistakenly went to the wrong house. Prosecutors say Yarl rang the doorbell and did not enter the house, and Lester shot him through the glass door.

According to the probable cause statement, Lester told police he had already gone to bed when he heard the doorbell ring. He picked up his revolver and went to the front door, where he claims he saw Yarl pulling on the exterior storm door handle - a claim Yarl denies. Lester told officers he was "scared to death" and fired twice. He was charged Monday with first-degree assault and armed criminal action.

Today, Lester's grandson made an appearance on CNN and told Don Lemon that his grandfather is racist. His evidence? He's a "a stock American Christian male". Oh, and he watches Fox News.

\u201cDon Lemon: Why do you say that your grandfather is racist?\n\nGrandson of homeowner who shot Ralph Yarl: He\u2019s just a stock American Christian male, older\u2026 that\u2019s just how they are\u201d
— End Wokeness (@End Wokeness) 1682010453

"He's just a stock American Christian male...older, you know, that's just how they are. Conspiracies and weird random racist things they say and it doesn't make sense but, they're just scared."

Lemon pointed out that he was making a very broad generalization and asked him to elaborate further. So he did.

"I feel like a lot of people of that generation, they're caught up in this 24 hour news cycle of fear and paranoia, perpetuated by some other news stations, and he was fully into that. He'd sit and watch Fox News all day, everyday, blaring in his living room. And I think that stuff really kind of reinforces this negative view of minority groups, and leads people - doesn't necessarily lead people to be racist, but reinforces and galvanizes racist people and their beliefs."

So it doesn't MAKE anyone racist, it just galvanizes all the racists that happen to watch it. I see.

This shooting seems like it could have a racial component to it - we don't know yet. And answering a doorbell with a loaded gun does seem a tad paranoid. But it leaves a bad taste in my mouth when people publicly denounce members of their family on national television. And lumping all American Christian males together as "racist" is egregious. What could solve racial divisions better than a universal Savior who died for all mankind?

>

<

title: Crowder exposes PETA as the vicious animal-killers they are
description:
Crowder and crew closed out the last free week of MugClub with a segment on PETA. PETA recently tweeted, "Instead of raising a glass for Budweiser's 90th anniversary, we're raising awareness of their cruel horse mutilation by passing out 90 bottles of Ripple White Ale."

\u201cInstead of raising a glass for @Budweiser's 90th anniversary, we're raising awareness of their cruel horse mutilation by passing out 90 bottles of Ripple White Ale.\u201d
— PETA (@PETA) 1681348216

Crowder explained that he is not a huge fan of practices that crop animal's ears and horses, but they always serve a purpose. He then brought up how PETA actually kills a lot of animals. In 2021, PETA's Virginia shelter alone killed 50,000 animals. The Virginia Department of Agriculture identified the shelter in Norfolk as, "the single largest killer of animals in the state." This is a fact everyone brushes over, but PETA euthanizes animals at an exponentially higher rate than other places whose job it is to re-home animals.

Crowder then highlighted how in 2022 alone, PETA killed over 2,000 dogs and cats with a 74% kill rate in their shelter, and a 2.1% adoption rate. He contrasted this with the rates of an average Virginia shelter - 74.5% adoption rate, and a 5.2% kill rate. Crowder then brought up a 2014 Virginia law that defined a private animal shelter as "a facility operated for the purpose of finding permanent adoptive homes for animals." PETA then lobbied against this bill. Crowder explained how, not only does PETA kill at an astronomically high rate, they used their millions in funding to lobby for the ability to continue killing animals at an astronomically high rate.

title: Chaos ensues when guest lectures Piers Morgan that he's 'not allowed' to be disgusted by Sam Smith
description:
Piers Morgan got into a bit of a spat with one of his guests over Sam Smith. Note: Morgan now requests to be referred to with his proper pronouns, "Hottest man in the world, Piers — according to some and yourself.”

Piers was speaking with author Douglas Murray and comedian James Barr about Sam Smith's recent performances which are, of course, demonic and highly disturbing. Murray claimed the artist was managing to keep people's attention with announcements about gender identity, saying, "And then he said he was non-binary, and he said he didn’t know what it meant — well, of course he didn’t, because there’s no such thing."

Barr quickly corrected Murray's pronoun usage from "he" to "they". Murray then criticized Smith's appearance and overall lack of clothing while performing: "Sam Smith is like pudgy and very ugly. And so people look at it, and he looks ridiculous. And the problem is that he’s saying, ‘Don’t ridicule me,’ but it’s hard not to ridicule when they present themselves as — ridiculous.”

\u201c"Hottest man in the world, Piers - according to some and yourself."\n\nPiers Morgan insists on being referred to by his preferred pronouns.\n\n@piersmorgan | @DouglasKMurray | @imjamesbarr | #PMU\u201d
— Piers Morgan Uncensored (@Piers Morgan Uncensored) 1681936808

Piers agreed, but Barr was obviously quite offended. He called it "disgusting rhetoric" and said they're "not allowed" to find Smith disgusting. Piers fired back, "If they’re going to dress like that on a stage in front of millions of people around the world, absolutely I can.”

This is a great point about our current culture. Celebrities shove disgusting, vile, and disturbing things in our faces, and demand we call it beautiful and inspiring. It's the same as the trans movement's attempt to force pronouns on everyone. They're demanding we participate in the delusion.

Despite the heated nature of the argument, they ended on a more friendly note, with Piers asking Barr if he remembered his preferred pronouns. Barr replied, "Hottest man in the world, Piers — according to some and yourself."

>

title: LOL: Eric Swalwell Cries About Marjorie Taylor Greene's Merch, So She Brings Up Him Banging A Chinese Spy
description:
Marjorie Taylor Greene is back at it again with her sass, and the Dems are not having it. During yesterday's Homeland Security committee hearing, she brought up Eric Swalwell's history of banging Fang Fang the Chinese spy. It did not go over well.

Department of Homeland Security Secretary Alejandro Mayorkas testified before the committee about the budget proposal. While questioning Mayorkas, Swalwell, for some reason, took the opportunity to criticize Green's merch. She sells shirts that say "Defund the FBI." How this related to the budget of Homeland Security, I do not know. But Swalwell broke out poster boards of Marjorie's Instagram to show off the (apparently) highly offensive merch.

Greene responded, "That was quite entertaining from someone that had a sexual relationship with a Chinese spy, and everyone knows it. But thanks for entertaining—"

\u201cChaos erupts in House as Democrats panic to get official record scrubbed after MTG goes absolutely nuclear on Fang-Fang-lover Eric Swalwell:\n\n"That was quite entertaining from someone that had a sexual relationship with a Chinese spy. And everyone knows it!"\ud83d\udd25\u201d

title: 'I Think It's Insulting': Don Lemon Spars with 2024 Candidate Over The Civil War And Gun Rights
description:
Don Lemon has been having a rough go on his new morning slot. First, he had to go to HR training on how to stop offending women, due to his suggestion that women shrivel up and die once they turn 50. Now, he totally lost his composure on air when a guest disagreed with him on historical facts.

Presidential candidate Vivek Ramaswamy joined Lemon and Poppy Harlow yesterday morning, but the segment ended abruptly due to Don's palpable anger. Ramaswamy and Lemon were discussing Ramaswamy's recent NRA speech, during which he said: "We fought a civil war in this country to give black Americans the equal protection under the law that we failed to secure them in 1776. But then, you want to know what happened? Southern states passed anti-gun laws that stopped black people from owning guns; the Democrat Party, then as in now, wanted to put them back in chains."

\u201cCNN's @donlemon BATTLES @VivekGRamaswamy over the Civil War and gun rights.\n\nREAD: https://t.co/i2gHaHaZJK\u201d
— Washington Examiner (@Washington Examiner) 1681936736

When Harlow asked him why the Democrat Party currently wants to put black people in chains, Ramaswamy explained how the sentiment dates back to the policies of LBJ's Great Society: "The very policies that we implemented in this country in the name of helping black Americans have actually been disastrous for black Americans and all Americans, and I think that that’s something that we need to wake up to."

Lemon responded that he doesn't see what the Civil War has to do with gun rights, and Ramaswamy explained how "black people did not get to enjoy the other freedoms until their Second Amendment rights were secured." But Lemon argued that black people still don't enjoy freedoms. And then told Ramaswamy he actually can't talk about this at all, because he isn't black.

I don't think this guy is going to be the 2024 candidate. But he's gaining some notoriety, and this little spar with Don Lemon will certainly help with that. I also don't understand why Don Lemon was so offended at the suggestion that gun rights may have helped black Americans. But then again, I'm not black. So, according to Don, I can't even discuss these things.

>

title: Watch: Old man valiantly tries stopping a shoplifter, winds up on the pavement for his troubles
description:
You admire the old man's moxy. He no doubt comes from a generation where shoplifting was considered "bad" and "illegal." Where men stood up to hooligans like this. But that's all a bygone era.

In 2023, I would advise not doing this:

Reno, Nevada pic.twitter.com/AaVLYESfQD
— Clown World ™ 🤡 (@ClownWorld_) April 19, 2023

It's an all too common scene. A criminal, taking advantage of progressive "equity" laws that make stealing the new national pastime, casually attempting to walk out of stores with shopping carts full of stolen goods. This Walmart greeter attempted to stop it. He wound up on the ground.

The camera didn't catch how he wound up on the ground. He could have tripped. Or, the thug could have hit him. If I were to imagine a scumbag who would steal and assault the elderly, he would also be someone who BRINGS HIS CHILD WITH HIM AND HAS THE KID IN THE CART OF STOLEN GOODS.

I get wanting to do something. We all see these videos and what our cities are turning into. Had this been a local business, I'd be all for stopping the theft.

But this is Walmart. A corporation that has made it clear it doesn't care about a) theft, and b) you. Stolen merchandise can be written off. Your attempt to stop a thief could be a liability risk. This old man did what he thought was right and there is more of a chance of him getting fired for it than for the company to acknowledge his heroism. There's also an above-average chance his bosses voted for and donated money to the elected officials who support policies that have caused the increase in crime.

Worry about your family that wants to see you home safe. That matters more than this random scumbag.

>

title: Watch: Woman has hilarious reaction to men "blowing up" the airport's all-gender bathroom
description:
It's 2023 and all-gender bathrooms are the way of the future, I guess. Sometimes, you just have to laugh at the absurdity of it all as this woman did.

In the olden days, walking into a bathroom with a recording device would be considered weird. But the other patrons of the all-gender bathroom seemed to be okay with it.

Her face at the end says it all 🤣 pic.twitter.com/r9JSgho0KW
— Clown World ™ 🤡 (@ClownWorld_) April 19, 2023

At least these are all adults. Stories about "all" gender bathrooms tend to revolve around schools and how those schools sacrifice young girls at the altar of wokeness. Where a boy in a dress gets rapey, but both the Biden administration and the school board side with the boy in a dress. Because he's a boy in a dress.

It's unclear what airport this is, other than everyone had a wee bit of southern twang to their voice. Our filmmaker's reaction as we all experience the all-gender bathroom together for the first time is what makes this 10/10 content.

"You're doing your makeup while there's a man in there pissing."

"You're cute, though."

"Obviously a man went in that one!"

The libering mystery is if it was obvious because the man blew it up with a number two, or didn't have the best aim with a number one. Or both. It's an airport. The dude had been holding in for hours because there is no room in the airplane shitter. It makes you wonder how people managed the "mile-high club" back in the day, but that's a blog post for another time.

>

title: Paradigm shift? Popular ESPN host speaks out AGAINST Lia Thomas, biological males competing in girls' sports
description:
ESPN “Sunday NFL Countdown” host Sam Ponder has spoken out AGAINST Joe Biden's new Title IX rules allowing transgender women, known in pro-biology circles as "boys," to compete against biological girls. As of this writing, she still has a job.

Y'all know the debate. It's been raging since Fallon Fox was smashing orbital bones and Mack Beggs was choking girls out.

Transgender wrestler Mack Beggs wins second straight Texas girls’ high school title https://t.co/T1Hr3uT1yv pic.twitter.com/bXzpKJNoi6
— The Washington Times (@WashTimes) February 25, 2018

One side of the debate, the side that believes in biology, feels that because boys are born with certain biological advantages in strength and athletics, it is unfair for them to compete against girls. Effectively robbing girls of opportunities like scholarships and being able to discover themselves as they learn, grow, and develop. The other side of the debate is anti-science, votes Democrat, and thinks you're a transphobe.

Ponder has thrown her support to the former group. Under the hashtag #savewomenssports, "This would take away so many opportunities for biological women and girls in sports. It is a shame that we are needing to fight for the integrity of Title IX in 2023 and the reason it was needed in the first place."

This would take away so many opportunities for biological women and girls in sports. It is a shame that we are needing to fight for the integrity of Title IX in 2023 and the reason it was needed in the first place. #savewomensports https://t.co/5Ufeha2emq
— Samantha Steele Ponder (@samponder) April 19, 2023

What makes Ponder's brave decision to speak common sense is threefold. One is that she shared a Riley Gaines tweet. Riley as of late has turned into Vice-Head Transphobe In Charge behind JK Rowling.

Second, unlike her colleague Sage Steele, Ponder is someone assumed to be more on the left. She is believed to have been the catalyst in getting Barstool Sports kicked off of the network after one episode of "Van Talk."

Third is that ESPN is a media network that cares more about getting that sweet ESG boost by pandering to woke politics than they care about things like "sports." So much so, Lia Thomas was featured in their video saluting "Women's" history month.

By the time you read this, the entire post can be moot. And Ponder was cyberbullied into an apology by trans activists and other domestic terrorists. My thinking is that Ponder knew what she was doing when she chose a Riley Gaines tweet to retweet and WANTED to speak out. We'll see if she stands by it.
